channel.title: Codetricks on Boettiger Group
channel.description: Recent content in Codetricks on Boettiger Group

item.description: nonparametric-bayes nonparametric-bayes sensitivity-trends runs. nonparametric-bayes sensitivity.R runs: explore facets to see what setting causes the below-perfect performance cluster. knitcitations updates to knitcitations (paste fron NEWS) Looking at adapting CSL for inline text formatting csl/issues/33 Implemented pandoc rendering ropensci Use of .Renviron vs .Rprofile for API keys Seems the difference between .Rprofile and .Renviron is that (a) the latter is just a named character vector, and (b) the latter is accessed by Sys.
